title: Fix video not loading/displaying on the video player page

requirements.summary: Fix video loading and display on VideoPlayerPage by ensuring proper blob URL construction and video element configuration
acceptanceCriteria: A video uploaded to the platform is visible and playable on the VideoPlayerPage.
The video element renders without a blank/black screen when navigating to a video's detail page.
No console errors related to video src, CORS, or missing blob/URL appear when loading a video.
The video loads within a reasonable time after the page renders.

file_operations.description: Fix the video element to use the ExternalBlob's getDirectURL() method for the src attribute instead of attempting to construct blob URLs manually. Add proper error handling for missing or invalid video files. Include loading states while the video metadata is being fetched. Ensure the video element has appropriate attributes (controls, preload) for proper playback. Add error event handlers to capture and display video loading failures to the user.

requirements.summary: Ensure VideoFeedPage displays video thumbnails or fallback placeholders correctly for all uploaded videos
acceptanceCriteria: Each VideoCard on the feed shows either a thumbnail image or a styled fallback placeholder.
Clicking a VideoCard navigates to the correct VideoPlayerPage for that video.

file_operations.description: Update the VideoCard component to properly handle optional thumbnail ExternalBlobs. When a thumbnail exists, use getDirectURL() to display it. When thumbnail is null or undefined, display the fallback placeholder image at frontend/public/assets/generated/video-placeholder.dim_400x600.png. Add error handling for thumbnail loading failures with fallback to the placeholder. Ensure the image element has proper alt text and loading attributes for accessibility and performance.
